betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Get a lot of wood. Put it into a pile (covered) light it and then allow it to cook.

This process can be seen in JEI, too. Using drains, (which require masonry bricks) you can also get Wood Tar.

After burning, the wood turns into Ash, which can be mined for Charcoal. 

This process can also be interchanged with the §9Forestry§f pit burning.
